title: BRIEF-Nampak Announces Disposal Of Glass Business For About R1.5 Bln
text:
BRIEF-Nampak Announces Disposal Of Glass Business For About R1.5 Bln

Stock Markets 35 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 08:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Nampak Announces Disposal Of Glass Business For About R1.5 Bln Sept 27 (Reuters) - Nampak Ltd : * JSE: NPK - DISPOSAL OF NAMPAK‘S GLASS BUSINESS AND WITHDRAWAL OF CAUTIONARY * NAMPAK LTD - ENTERED INTO A SALE OF BUSINESS AGREEMENT WITH ISANTI GLASS 1 PROPRIETARY LIMITED , KWANDE CAPITAL PROPRIETARY LIMITED, SABSA HOLDINGS * NAMPAK LTD - PROPOSED DEAL FOR IS ESTIMATED TO BE R1.5 BILLION * NAMPAK LTD - PROCEEDS FROM DISPOSAL SHALL BE USED PRIMARILY TO REDUCE COMPANY'S INTEREST BEARING DEBT

BRIEF-Nampak Announces Disposal Of Glass Business For About R1.5 Bln
description: BRIEF-Nampak Announces Disposal Of Glass Business For About R1.5 Bln
